original_text: The governor, therefore, ordered them not to eat any of the most sacred food until there should be a priest ministering with the Urim and Thummim.
korean_text: 총독이 그들에게 명령하여 우림과 둠밈을 가진 제사장이 일어나기 전에는 지성물을 먹지 말라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: not to eat any of the most sacred food
until there should be a priest
ministering with the Urim and Thummim
